DOC.brief_summary: - The purpose of this study is to to prove that the long-term efficacy of strategy of treatment adjustment at W24 according to virological response based on ROADMAP concept is better than standard of care strategy. - To evaluate the off-treatment durability of HBeAg seroconversion in patients who discontinued treatment due to sustained HBeAg seroconversion and HBV DNA<300copies/ml with over 12 months consolidation treatment
DOC.criteria: Treated with telbivudine or combined with adefovir in EFFORT study Patients are willing to participate in the extension study Patients provide information consent form Adjustment of poor compliance by investigators
